data.title: Who has Jo Koy dated?
data.meta_description: JO Koy has been romantically linked to several women. The comedian hosted the 2024 Golden Globes and many viewers are curious about his relationship status
data.text:
JO Koy has been romantically linked to several women.

The comedian hosted the 2024 Golden Globes and many viewers are curious about his relationship status.

Who has Jo Koy dated?

Jo Koy has been romantically linked to several women throughout his career.

He dated comedian and actress Chelsea Handler in 2021. The two had been friends for years and collaborated professionally before dating.

The pair dated for about a year before calling it quits in July 2022. A year later, Jo spoke to Page Six about their relationship status.

He said, "She's crushing it right now, so I have nothing but the best love for her."

From 2003 to 2013, the comedian was married to Angie King. Jo met the singer-songwriter during the early days of his career.

Angie is a Filipina-American artist who also goes by the stage name Nura Luca.

Despite divorcing, the exes are still on good terms and co-parent their son.

Whether Jo is currently in a relationship or not is unknown, as he has not confirmed his relationship status.

Who is Jo Koy?

Jo Koy is a Filipino-American comedian born on June 2, 1971, in Tacoma, Washington. His birth name is Joseph Glenn Herbert Sr.

Jo's popularity rose in the mid-2000s after appearing on popular late-night comedy shows like The Tonight Show and Jimmy Kimmel Live!

He has also appeared on Chelsea Lately, The Joy Behar Show, Last Call with Carson Daly, and Jamie Foxx: Laffapalooza.

He appeared on Chelsea Lately the most, with over 100 appearances on his resume.

Who is Jo Koy's son, Joseph Herbert Jr.?

Jo has a son with his wife named Joseph Herbert Jr. The younger Joseph was born on April 21, 2003, in Los Angeles, California.

Joseph has seen the highs and lows of his father's career, which has included rejection.

"My son was there when Netflix said no. I shot [my special, Jo Koy:] Live from Seattle, I had to pay for it," he told Tatlur Phillippines.

"He knows what his dad went through, so he knows it was more than just about me," he continued.

Jo also uses his son's antics as material in his comedic act. He has joked about his son's hygiene and adolescent angst in the past.
